trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing"> </xref> evento del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectDisposing%2A> method to provide access to the business object instance after any data operations that are using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control and business object are performed, but before the business object is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: La classe ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs viene utilizzata nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectDisposing%2A>metodo per fornire l'accesso all'istanza dell'oggetto business dopo qualsiasi operazione di dati che utilizzano il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>controllo e l'oggetto business vengono eseguite, ma prima l'oggetto viene eliminato definitivamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectDisposing%2A>

trans-unit.source: The business object is accessed using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto business è possibile accedere tramite il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: By adding a delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing> event, you can access any publicly exposed members of the business object to perform any final work or clean up.
trans-unit.target: Tramite l'aggiunta di un delegato per gestire l' <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>evento, è possibile accedere ai membri dell'oggetto business per eseguire qualsiasi operazione finale o pulire up. esposti pubblicamente</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectDisposing%2A> method is not called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control, if the method that performs data operations is a `static` method.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectDisposing%2A>metodo non viene chiamato dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>il controllo, se il metodo che esegue operazioni di dati è un `static` metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectDisposing%2A>

trans-unit.source: No business object instance is created when the method is static.
trans-unit.target: Nessuna istanza dell'oggetto business viene creato quando il metodo è statico.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying business object at various times in its lifecycle.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>controllo espone molti eventi che è possibile gestire per utilizzare l'oggetto business sottostante in diversi momenti nel ciclo di vita.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events and the associated <xref:System.EventArgs> classes and event handler delegates.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente sono elencati gli eventi e associato <xref:System.EventArgs>classi e i delegati del gestore eventi.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Event|EventArgs|EventHandler| |-----------|---------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>.
trans-unit.target: | Evento | EventArgs | EventHandler | |-----------|---------------|------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately before the instance of the business object is created.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica immediatamente prima che la creazione dell'istanza dell'oggetto business. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately after the instance of the business object is created.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica immediatamente dopo la creazione dell'istanza dell'oggetto business. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the data is retrieved.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica prima che i dati vengono recuperati. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>
trans-unit.target: Si verificano prima un'istruzione insert, update o un'operazione di eliminazione viene eseguita. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the data is retrieved.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica dopo che i dati vengono recuperati. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occur after the insert, update, or delete operation is completed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>.
trans-unit.target: Si verificano dopo l'inserimento, aggiornamento o l'operazione di eliminazione viene completata. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a business object is destroyed.|ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>|
trans-unit.target: Si verifica prima che venga eliminato un oggetto business. | ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs"> </xref> classe utilizzando l'oggetto specificato.

trans-unit.source: The business object with which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> interacts to perform data operations.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto business con cui il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> interagisce per eseguire operazioni sui dati.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the business object with which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control performs data operations.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto che rappresenta l'oggetto business con cui il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> controllo esegue le operazioni di dati.

trans-unit.source: If the data operation methods (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>) are instance methods, an instance of the business object is created before the method is executed.
trans-unit.target: Se i metodi dell'operazione data (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>) sono metodi di istanza, un'istanza di business di oggetto viene creato prima dell'esecuzione del metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can prevent the business object from being created for each call by saving the object in the ObjectInstance property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing> event handler.
trans-unit.target: È possibile impedire che l'oggetto business viene creata per ogni chiamata salvando l'oggetto nella proprietà ObjectInstance il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>gestore dell'evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>

trans-unit.source: In subsequent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating> events, you can retrieve the business object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Nelle successive <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>eventi, è possibile recuperare l'oggetto business dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>

trans-unit.source: The business object the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> uses to data operations; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is passed to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto business di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> viene utilizzato per le operazioni di dati; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, se <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> viene passato al <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs"> </xref>.
